title: West India
hero_image_alt: Desert dunes and coastal scenes from western India
subtitle: Deserts, Coasts & Colorful Festivals
intro: West India mixes desert landscapes, colourful festivals, vibrant coastal life and heritage cities. From the forts and palaces of Rajasthan to the white sands and Portuguese legacy of Goa, the region offers dramatic contrasts in scenery, food, and cultural experiences. This page covers best times to visit, top experiences, cities to explore and a curated gallery that gives a quick visual feel for the region.

best_time.off_season: May–Aug (hot in desert regions; monsoon on Konkan coast)
best_time.notes: Visit the desert and Rajasthan in winter for comfortable days and cool nights; coastal Goa and Konkan are best in winter and early spring.

top_experiences.title: Desert Expeditions
top_experiences.summary: Camel safaris, dune camping and stargazing.

top_experiences.title: Royal Luxury
top_experiences.summary: Palace hotels, heritage trains and palace circuits.

top_experiences.title: Beach Life & Water Sports
top_experiences.summary: Goa beaches, Konkan coast and coastal activities.

top_experiences.title: Craft & Handicraft Trails
top_experiences.summary: Kutch embroidery, blue pottery and Bidri metalwork.

top_experiences.title: Festival Culture
top_experiences.summary: Durga Puja, Ganesh Chaturthi and vibrant local festivals.

top_cities.title: Jaipur
top_cities.summary: Pink City with forts, palaces and bustling bazaars.
top_cities.how_to_reach_snippet: Nearest airport: Jaipur (JAI) / Rail: Jaipur Junction

top_cities.title: Jaisalmer
top_cities.summary: Desert fort city known for sand dunes and camel safaris.
top_cities.how_to_reach_snippet: Nearest airport: Jodhpur (JDH) + road / Rail: Jaisalmer station

top_cities.title: Goa
top_cities.summary: Beaches, Portuguese heritage and seafood culture.

top_cities.title: Surat
top_cities.summary: Textile and diamond hub with nearby heritage towns.
top_cities.how_to_reach_snippet: Nearest airport: Surat (STV) / Rail: Surat Junction

top_cities.title: Bhuj
top_cities.summary: Gateway to Kutch region, craft clusters and salt flats.
top_cities.how_to_reach_snippet: Nearest airport: Bhuj (BHJ) / Rail: Bhuj station

top_cities.title: Mumbai
top_cities.summary: India’s commercial capital — coast, cuisine and nightlife.
top_cities.how_to_reach_snippet: Nearest airport: Mumbai (BOM) / Rail: Mumbai CST / VT

travel_tips: Carry sun protection and plan for hot daytime temperatures in desert areas.
Book coastal stays in Goa early for peak season (Dec–Jan).
Respect local dress codes in temple and conservative rural areas.
Be mindful of water availability in remote desert circuits.

sample_itineraries.1-day: Jaipur highlights: City Palace, Amber Fort sunrise and bazaar stroll with local snacks.
sample_itineraries.3-day: Kutch loop: Bhuj, village craft visits, white desert salt flats and traditional performances.

logistics.typical_internal_transport: mix of domestic flights for long hops; trains and private cars for regional circuits
logistics.notes: Desert areas may require local guides; check road accessibility during monsoon.
